ped. Individuals with Miyoshi myopathy have highly elevated levels of an enzyme called creatine kinase (CK) in their blood, which often indicates muscle disease.",GHR,Miyoshi myopathy
How many people are affected by Miyoshi myopathy ?,"The exact prevalence of Miyoshi myopathy is unknown. In Japan, where the condition was first described, it is estimated to affect 1 in 440,000 individuals.",GHR,Miyoshi myopathy
